# The Armchair Historian

| youtube_id           = UCeUJFQ0D9qs6aVNyUt9fkeQ
| youtube_display_name  = The Armchair Historian
| youtube_years_active  =
| youtube_genre         = History
| youtube_subscribers   = 2.43 million
| youtube_views         = 374.6 million
| stats_update        = June 7, 2025
}}
Armchair Historian is an American production company founded by American historian Griffin Johnsen. The company is known for producing documentaries about armed conflicts on YouTube, in an animated format.
The channel's production team developed the videogame Fire & Maneuver, set in the Victorian era, which was released in 2023, as well as the videogame Master of Command, set during the Seven Years' War, released in 2025.
Personal life
Johnsen's grandfather fought in World War II.
